name: Wallet

commentData.description: Base class representing a wallet (a container of credentials).

methods.name: getWallet

tags.title: return
tags.description:
The wallet singleton, or null if one
has not been specified.

description: Get the wallet singleton.
The wallet singleton, or null if one
has not been specified.

methods.name: setWallet
description: Set the wallet singleton.

methods.name: list

commentData.description: List all of the credentials in the wallet.

tags.title: return
tags.description:
A promise that is resolved with
an array of credential names, or rejected with an
error.

description: List all of the credentials in the wallet.
A promise that is resolved with
an array of credential names, or rejected with an
error.

methods.name: contains

commentData.description:
Check to see if the named credentials are in
the wallet.

tags.title: return
tags.description:
A promise that is resolved with
a boolean; true if the named credentials are in the
wallet, false otherwise.

description: Check to see if the named credentials are in
the wallet.
A promise that is resolved with
a boolean; true if the named credentials are in the
wallet, false otherwise.

methods.name: get

commentData.description: Get the named credentials from the wallet.

tags.title: return
tags.description:
A promise that is resolved with
the named credentials, or rejected with an error.

description: Get the named credentials from the wallet.
A promise that is resolved with
the named credentials, or rejected with an error.

methods.name: add

commentData.description: Add a new credential to the wallet.

tags.title: return
tags.description:
A promise that is resolved when
complete, or rejected with an error.

description: Add a new credential to the wallet.
A promise that is resolved when
complete, or rejected with an error.

methods.name: update

commentData.description: Update existing credentials in the wallet.

tags.title: return
tags.description:
A promise that is resolved when
complete, or rejected with an error.

description: Update existing credentials in the wallet.
A promise that is resolved when
complete, or rejected with an error.

methods.name: remove

commentData.description: Remove existing credentials from the wallet.

tags.title: return
tags.description:
A promise that is resolved when
complete, or rejected with an error.

description: Remove existing credentials from the wallet.
A promise that is resolved when
complete, or rejected with an error.
Base class representing a wallet (a container of credentials).
